text: tame kahi do ke saksi apava mate sauthi motum kona che? Tame kahi do ke mari ane tamari vacce saksi apanara allaha che ane mari pase a kura'ana vahi vade avatarita karavamam avyum che, jethi hum a kura'ana dvara, tamane ane je loko sudhi a kura'ana pahonce te saune saceta karum, sum tame sace ja a saksi apaso ke allaha ta'ala sathe bija an'ya pujyo pana che, tame kahi do ke hum to saksi nathi apato, tame kahi do ke basa! Te to eka ja pujya che ane kharekhara hum tamara (allaha sathe) bhagidara theravavana karane kantalelo chum
